titles.title: To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System certain properties in South Carolina.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs.

committee.subcommittee: Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: 10/1/2013--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to revise Coastal Barrier Resources System maps relating to the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Unit SC-01 in South Carolina to remove the following parcels of land adjacent to property located at 10108 Kings Road in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina: (1) the parcel identified in the land records of Horry County, South Carolina, as TMS 155-00-01-115, consisting of approximately 6.94 acres; and (2) the parcel identified in such land records as TMS 155-00-01-051, consisting of approximately 13.91 acres.
